hits.title: Research Engineer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll build and scale research infrastructure for AI alignment applications using singular learning theory.
  • Maintain and expand research tools for experiments with large language models up to 100B parameters.
  • Collaborate with researchers to translate theoretical insights into empirical research tools.
  • Participate in weekly planning sessions with the engineering team.
  • Develop and maintain codebases for applications like measuring safety fine-tuning reversibility and detecting backdoors.

  * Develop and maintain codebases for applications like measuring safety fine-tuning reversibility and detecting backdoors.

hits.title: Contractor, Web Development, AI Risk Explorer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll develop a fully functional website for the AI Risk Explorer (AIRE), an online platform monitoring large-scale AI risks.
  • Implement frontend sections including Risk Explainers, Evaluation Hub, Incident Tracker, Policy Tracker, blog, and newsletter.
  • Integrate external tools and artifacts from platforms like Retool, Metabase, and Google Sheets.
  • Establish feedback loops with the core team to ensure visualizations meet analytical needs.
  • Test responsiveness across devices and document all code for maintenance purposes.

hits.title: Research Scientist, AI Safety, ML Focus
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll contribute to the Scientist AI agenda using your expertise in AI safety and machine learning.
  • Help clarify central AI safety research questions for the Scientist AI agenda.
  • Analyze proposed solutions and develop novel ideas for complex safety problems.
  • Design and implement ML algorithms and experiments to test AI safety concepts.
  • Scrutinize the agenda's strategic fit for mitigating AI risk to prioritize critical experiments efficiently.

  * Scrutinize the agenda's strategic fit for mitigating AI risk to prioritize critical experiments efficiently.

hits.title: Engineering Team Lead
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll lead a team of software engineers while doing hands-on development for a nonprofit focused on AI safety and policy.
  • Provide technical guidance, mentorship, and code reviews to ensure quality across projects.
  • Build demonstrations of frontier AI risks and own projects from conception to publication.
  • Present technical solutions to stakeholders and collaborate with research teams.
  • Identify high-impact engineering opportunities and propose novel directions in AI safety work.

hits.title: Senior Software Engineer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll build AI risk demos and research infrastructure for a nonprofit focused on raising policymaker awareness about AI risks.
  • Develop and ship AI risk demonstrations within days while maintaining technical excellence.
  • Lead architecture decisions, establish engineering best practices, and mentor junior engineers.
  • Collaborate closely with researchers to implement their requirements and coordinate with external stakeholders.
  • Maintain and improve the organization's core technical stack while working in a self-directed environment.

hits.title: Senior ML Research Scientist
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll design and implement innovative ML models aimed at solving advanced AI safety problems.
  • Propose and develop novel ML models tailored to solve complex AI safety challenges.
  • Collaborate with mathematicians and research scientists to integrate theoretical advancements into practical algorithms.
  • Adapt and fine-tune frontier models to enhance their applicability to specific settings.
  • Design experimental protocols and evaluation frameworks to validate hypotheses at the scale of frontier models.

hits.title: Senior ML Research Developer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll collaborate with ML research scientists to solve difficult training and inference problems using very large models.
  • Collaborate with researchers to accelerate research and implement novel models and simulated environments.
  • Design and implement workflows for research experiments across toy scenarios and large-scale projects.
  • Develop tools and libraries to optimize computing resource usage.
  • Establish, document, and maintain best practices for ML model development workflows.

hits.title: Full Stack Engineer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll build web applications supporting AI safety through formal verification at the Beneficial AI Foundation.
  • Develop end-to-end features for verilib.org using PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS/JS, and React.
  • Create responsive web layouts based on Figma designs for both public and internal interfaces.
  • Implement backend systems that support AI-written verified code rather than untrusted neural networks.
  • Contribute to ensuring powerful AI systems remain under human control through technical safeguards.

company.name: Beneficial AI Foundation
company.description: The Beneficial AI Foundation aims to keep AI beneficial for generations to come. It supports a broad range of technical AI safety research though staff research, university partnerships and its Buterin Fellowship program.

hits.title: Research Engineer, AI Safety
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll work with Max Tegmark at the Beneficial AI Foundation to develop AI tools for formal verification of AI systems.
  • Contribute to research on creating verified code that implements machine-learned algorithms rather than deploying untrusted neural networks.
  • Apply formal verification techniques to ensure powerful AI systems remain under human control.
  • Develop mathematical frameworks and programming solutions at the intersection of formal verification and machine learning.
  • Work independently on projects aimed at addressing safety challenges of advanced AI systems.

hits.title: Member of Technical Staff, Safety for Agents
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll develop safety mechanisms for agent-based Large Language Models that access external resources and take actions in the world.
  • Design and conduct data collection tasks for training safer AI systems.
  • Implement post-training algorithms and evaluation methods to ensure model safety.
  • Analyze datasets for quality, biases, and suitability for training ML models.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including machine learning, product, and policy to improve AI safety.

  * Analyze datasets for quality, biases, and suitability for training ML models.
  * Collaborate with cross-functional teams including machine learning, product, and policy to improve AI safety.

company.name: Cohere
company.description: Cohere is a Canadian technology company focused on artificial intelligence for developers and enterprises. They specialise in large language models (LLMs) and retrieval augmented generation (RAG) capabilities.

hits.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer, S-Process
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you will improve and maintain existing grant evaluation software.
  • Work on app development full-time and collaborate with key team members.
  • Implement and adjust mathematical formulas for decision-making.
  • Prototype and design visual user interfaces for grant evaluations and decision-making algorithms.
  • Participate in meetings, dedicating 4-8 hours a week, and contribute to diverse tasks to support clients like Jaan Tallinn.

company.description: Survival and Flourishing is a public benefit corporation engaged in philanthropy to support companies, organisations, and projects aiming to improve the survival and flourishing of humanity and other sentient beings. They have previously donated to 80,000 Hours.

hits.title: Research Engineer, Novel AI Platforms for Multiscale Alignment
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll develop novel AI platforms addressing critical alignment challenges and practical LLM agents.
  • Design and implement architectures for agent execution environments and interaction platforms.
  • Develop optimization algorithms for multi-objective and cooperative AI systems.
  • Create mechanisms for conflict resolution and preference aggregation in multi-agent settings.
  • Build technical infrastructure to investigate experimental AI alignment approaches while collaborating with researchers.
hits.description_for_search:
* In this role, you'll develop novel AI platforms addressing critical alignment challenges and practical LLM agents.
  * Design and implement architectures for agent execution environments and interaction platforms.
  * Develop optimization algorithms for multi-objective and cooperative AI systems.
  * Create mechanisms for conflict resolution and preference aggregation in multi-agent settings.
  * Build technical infrastructure to investigate experimental AI alignment approaches while collaborating with researchers.

company.name: Center for AI Risk Management and Alignment
company.description: The Center for AI Risk Management and Alignment is a nonprofit that aims to improve the technical, policy, and multidisciplinary aspects of AI risk management, safety, and alignment.

hits.title: Data Scientist, AI
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll analyze and improve techniques for classifying results and identifying vulnerabilities in AI systems.
  • Evaluate alternative approaches and develop enhanced methods for vulnerability detection.
  • Identify new insights and visualizations from data that benefit customers.
  • Design and implement improvements to data pipelines and labelling systems.
  • Advise the R&D and engineering teams on data engineering and science best practices while clearly communicating complex insights.
hits.description_for_search:
* In this role, you'll analyze and improve techniques for classifying results and identifying vulnerabilities in AI systems.
  * Evaluate alternative approaches and develop enhanced methods for vulnerability detection.
  * Identify new insights and visualizations from data that benefit customers.
  * Design and implement improvements to data pipelines and labelling systems.
  * Advise the R&D and engineering teams on data engineering and science best practices while clearly communicating complex insights.

company.description: Mindgard is a London-based startup providing cybersecurity for AI. Their flagship Mindgard AI Security Labs aims to secure organisations' AI/ML models and data.

hits.title: Senior Software Engineer
hits.description_short:
• This role requires a Senior Software Engineer to build Elicit into a product researchers can’t live without.
  • Own the delivery of user-centric features and ensure they are shipped weekly.
  • Work on a mix of features, prototypes for new ideas, and exploratory projects, taking into account user needs and decision-making.
  • Maintain high-quality standards by balancing feature delivery with the development of extensible and maintainable systems.
  • Ensure scalability, resilience, and ease of operation for features in production and contribute to UX, system design, and architecture discussions.

hits.title: Expression of Interest, Research Engineer
hits.description_short:
• This role requires research engineers to work on AI safety projects and red-teaming.
  • Conduct research and development on safety mechanisms for frontier AI technologies.
  • Collaborate with experts to produce academic papers and reports.
  • Contribute to the design and execution of experiments and simulations.
  • Communicate findings through various channels, including academic publications and events.

company.description: FAR AI aims to ensure AI systems are trustworthy and beneficial to society. They incubate and accelerate research agendas that are too resource-intensive for academia but not yet ready for commercialisation by industry.

hits.title: Open Call, Machine Learning Engineer
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll develop cutting-edge security solutions for AI systems to ensure safety and reliability.
  • Design, train, and deploy advanced machine learning models with focus on neural network architectures.
  • Build high-performance ML systems using Python and frameworks like PyTorch.
  • Develop scalable ML pipelines and integrate models into cloud-based infrastructure.
  • Apply expertise in AI security, adversarial ML, and robustness testing to create safer AI systems.
hits.description_for_search:
* In this role, you'll develop cutting-edge security solutions for AI systems to ensure safety and reliability.
  * Design, train, and deploy advanced machine learning models with focus on neural network architectures.
  * Build high-performance ML systems using Python and frameworks like PyTorch.
  * Develop scalable ML pipelines and integrate models into cloud-based infrastructure.
  * Apply expertise in AI security, adversarial ML, and robustness testing to create safer AI systems.

hits.title: Member of Technical Staff, AI Digest (x2)
hits.description_short:
• In this role, you'll be responsible for ideating, designing, building, and writing interactive explainers and demos about AI progress for AI Digest.
  • Conceptualise and prioritise ideas for explainers that demystify AI progress and risks.
  • Design and build interactive web demos that clearly and compellingly explain AI capabilities.
  • Engage with policymakers, think tanks, media, and public to grow AI Digest's readership and influence.
  • Collaborate with experts to ensure accurate demonstrations of frontier AI capabilities and assess the impact of your work.

  * Engage with policymakers, think tanks, media, and public to grow AI Digest's readership and influence.
  * Collaborate with experts to ensure accurate demonstrations of frontier AI capabilities and assess the impact of your work.

hits.title: AI Safety Research Engineer
hits.description_short:
• This role involves working closely with Max Tegmark and Steve Omohundro on provable AI safety through formal verification.
  • Work either remotely or at MIT in Cambridge, Massachusetts on AI safety projects.
  • Conduct research to ensure powerful AI systems remain under human control.
  • Utilise formal verification or mathematical theorem proving to address AI safety challenges.
  • Engage in programming tasks and apply a strong mathematical and machine learning background.
